title: France panorama. [No. 70/28]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Summer hats - hat models by Barthet. 2. Paris porcelain - an exhibition at Sevres presents a half-century of French porcelain craftsmanship. 3. Simplifying life - the 50th anniversary of the standardisation movement in France. 4. Georges van Parys - France’s leading composer of film music reminisces on his work. 5. Saint Louis, or virtue on the throne - the 700th anniversary of the death of the saintly King Louis IX.
